DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Fractyl Duodenal Mucosal Resurfacing ( DMR ) Procedure treatment Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Duodenal Mucosal Resurfacing Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 28 75 year age Diagnosed Type 2 Diabetes less 10 year HbA1c 7.5 10.0 % ( 5986 mmol/mol ) BMI ≥ 24 ≤ 40 kg/m2 Diagnosed Type 1 Diabetes history ketoacidosis Probable insulin production failure , define fast C Peptide serum < 1 ng/mL ( 333pmol/l ) Current use Insulin Use GLP1 analogue Active uncontrolled GERD define grade III esophagitis great Upper gastrointestinal condition ulcer , gastric varix , stricture , congenital acquire intestinal telangiectasia
